scripts.rmi: docker rmi cryptotalks-api cryptotalks-db cryptotalks-crypto-rates cryptotalks-auth cryptotalks-front
scripts.dev:local: export NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=front" "npm run start:dev --workspace=api" "npm run start:dev --workspace=auth" "npm run start:dev --workspace=crypto-rates"
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=api && npm run format --workspace=auth && npm run format --workspace=crypto-rates && npm run lint --workspace=api && npm run lint --workspace=auth && npm run lint --workspace=crypto-rates && npm run lint --prefix services/front
scripts.prep: npm --prefix . install && npm --prefix services/api install && npm --prefix services/auth install && npm --prefix services/crypto-rates install && npm --prefix services/front install
